name: RZToolbar
summary: RZToolbar provides convenience for accessing toolbars' bar items views while preserves those easy-to-use interfaces of UIToolbar class.
description:
RZToolbar provides convenience for accessing toolbars' bar item views while preserves those easy-to-use interfaces of UIToolbar class.
In fact, I build this custom toolbar style view also due to some strange layout issues for UIToolbar.
